full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify
#### Deconstruction of Buildings 16 and 30 – AAFC Nappan Research Farm

**Notice Reference:** WS3839215722-Doc3839546914

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Notice Date:** January 23, 2023
**Closing Date:** February 7, 2023, 14:00 EST (amended)

**Procurement Category:** Construction

**Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** Nova Scotia
**Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia

**Two-Phase Selection Process**

The Invitation to Qualify is a two-phase process. The first phase (Phase One) will evaluate the qualifications of all prospective suppliers. The second phase (Phase Two) will invite qualified suppliers to submit a financial bid for the project based on the specifications and drawings.

**Relevant UN/SPSC Codes:**

* 22102000: Building demolition machinery and equipment
* 72000000: Building and facility construction and maintenance services

**Selection Criteria:**
The selection criterion for this project is based on the lowest price.

**Confirmation of Qualification:**
To confirm your qualification for this project, please submit the required supporting documentation by February 7, 2023, 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be considered non-responsive.

**Notice URL:**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15203274?extsite=MTUyMDMyNzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact:**
Timothee Beausoleil
PSPC/SPAC
timothy.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
